overview: The fifteenth installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. Every time, I carefully selected and recorded it in this work from among the many posted videos, but I further delved into the background of the video, such as "Scary", "Danger", "Super Abnormal Phenomenon", etc., and strengthened my research.
tagline: A collection of psychic videos that everyone is sure to be scared!!
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 15
